description.en-US:
Features in TB78
  • Reply++ button/message context menu/keyboard: shift-alt-G:
    • Start a new email compose. Use 'to', 'cc, 'bcc' of the currently selected email. Clean away subject, body, attachments, so that it is a new email.
  • Alt/Reply++ button/Alt+message context menu:
    • Just as standard button use, but keep old subject.
  • Shift/Reply++ button/Shift+message context menu:
    • Add your identity as bcc, so that you automatically force a copy to yourself.
  • Other addons:
    • Nostalgy++: easy archiving/moving of emails to their destination folders, with autocomplete of folder names and rules for suggested folder. Compose window: always display cc or bcc, easy selecting input fields (to, cc, bcc, body, attachments), etc. Text insert++: Easy inserting standard text. br+ctrl-D converts to best regards. Define your own replacements. Cursor can be in the middle of the replacement text. Attachment image viewer: Download dialog shows thumbnail of image. Image viewer with zoom, rotate, flip, slideshow etc. Xnote++: Add notes to your emails to remind or to plan a reply.

name.en-US: New Email To All:reply, ready for new subject/body

summary.en-US:
Do you often send emails to the same list of people? Do you press reply and then clear off subject/email body?

No longer. Open a new compose window with all recipients/cc/bcc in a clean state. You can start with a new subject line and email body.
summary.de:
Ihr sendet oft an die gleichen Empfänger, drückt 'allen antworten' und löscht dann Betreff und Emailtext?

Das macht ab jetzt dieses Addon.
